title: Falling for Him 3
description: This is the third book in the Falling for Him series (New Adult and College Romance). If you haven't read book 1, please do so, it's FREE right here on Amazon. ***DOWNLOAD the FREE ebook ‘Falling for Him 1’ TODAY*** (Falling for Him Contemporary Romance Series, Book 1).  Rachel and Peter have found each other - again and are more in love than ever. They could be happily ever after if it wasn't for a hovering black shadow, ready to swoop down and bring havoc to their relationship.  Lara, the crazy ex-girlfriend of Peter has threatened to take her life, if he doesn't marry her. Will he oblige to save her life?
author: Jessica Gray
